title: Installing Red Hat build of OpenTelemetry
subtitle: Deploying the OpenTelemetry Operator and Collector instances

abstract.para: This document describes how to install Red Hat build of OpenTelemetry on OpenShift. Learn how to deploy the OpenTelemetry Operator, create namespaces, and configure OpenTelemetry Collector instances using either the web console or the CLI. Includes procedures for setting up RBAC resources and configuring node scheduling options.
